slide.title: Getting Started

list.bullet: Grab a copy of the current php4 CVS tree
Look at the existing extensions for code examples

example.title: Grabbing a copy of the CVS tree - Anonymous CVS instructions

slide.example: % cvs -d:pserver:cvsread@cvs.php.net:/repository login Password: phpfi % cvs -d:pserver:cvsread@cvs.php.net:/repository co php4 % cd php4 % cvs -d:pserver:cvsread@cvs.zend.com:/repository login Password: Zend % cvs -d:pserver:cvsread@cvs.zend.com:/repository co Zend % cvs -d:pserver:cvsread@cvs.zend.com:/repository co TSRM
